Package org.klotski.controller

Class OpenFileController

java.lang.Object
org.klotski.controller.OpenFileController
public class OpenFileController extends Object
OpenFileController is a controller class that is used to Open a saved game.
It dialogues with Window, Board, HighScoreUpdater
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrea Mutti, Alessandro Girlanda, Alba Casanica, Matteo Meneghin

  • Method Details

    • open

      public void open()
      Function to select and load a saved configuration.
      It is preferable to call this function inline, for example: 
      
      new OpenFileController(this).open();
